com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase
Class BoundedHBaseClient

java.lang.Object
  com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.BoundedHBaseClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
HBaseClient
public class BoundedHBaseClient
extends Object
implements HBaseClient

An HBaseClient that constrains the maximum number of concurrent asynchronous requests.

This client places an upper-bounds on the number of concurrent asynchronous requests awaiting completion. When this limit is reached, subsequent requests will block until an existing request completes.

This behaviour is particularly useful for throttling high-throughput applications where HBase is the bottle-neck. Without backing-off, such an application may run out of memory. By constraining the maximum number of requests to a sufficiently high limit, but low enough so that it can be reached without running out of memory, such applications can organically throttle and back-off their requests.

Book-keeping of in-flight requests is done using a Semaphore which is configured as "non-fair" to reduce its impact on request throughput.

Constructor Detail

BoundedHBaseClient

public BoundedHBaseClient(HBaseClient client,
                          int maxRequests)
Create a new instance with the given limit on concurrent requests for the given underlying HBaseClient implementation.

Parameters:
client - the underlying HBaseClient implementation
maxRequests - the maximum number of concurrent requests

BoundedHBaseClient

public BoundedHBaseClient(HBaseClient client,
                          Semaphore semaphore)
Create a new instance with the given semaphore for the given underlying HBaseClient implementation.

Note: this is only really useful for sharing a Semaphore between two BoundedHBaseClient instances, which only really makes sense for instances configured for the same cluster, but with different client-side settings. Use with caution!!

Parameters:
client - the underlying HBaseClient implementation
semaphore - the Semaphore to track concurrent asynchronous requests with
Method Detail

wrap

public static HBaseClient wrap(HBaseClientConfiguration configuration,
                               HBaseClient client)
Builds a new HBaseClient according to the given HBaseClientConfiguration.

If the HBaseClientConfiguration.maxConcurrentRequests is non-zero in the configuration, this will build a BoundedHBaseClient that wraps the given client.

If HBaseClientConfiguration.maxConcurrentRequests is zero, the given HBaseClient will be returned verbatim.

Parameters:
configuration - an HBaseClientConfiguration defining the HBaseClients parameters
client - an underlying HBaseClient implementation
Returns:
an HBaseClient that satisfies the configuration of the maximum concurrent requests
